definitions.definition: To groom with a toothed implement , especially a comb .
examples: I need to comb my hair before we leave the house.
definitions.label_groups: transitive , especially of hair or fur

definitions.definition: To separate choice cotton fibers from worsted cloth fibers.
To search thoroughly as if raking over an area with a comb .
examples: Police combed the field for evidence after the assault.

definitions.definition: To roll over, as the top or crest of a wave ; to break with a white foam , as waves.
To turn a vessel parallel to (the track of) (a torpedo ) so as to reduce one's size as a target .

main_definition: ( transitive , especially of hair or fur ) To groom with a toothed implement , especially a comb .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To separate choice cotton fibers from worsted cloth fibers.
( transitive ) To search thoroughly as if raking over an area with a comb .
( nautical , intransitive ) To roll over, as the top or crest of a wave ; to break with a white foam , as waves.
( naval , transitive ) To turn a vessel parallel to (the track of) (a torpedo ) so as to reduce one's size as a target .
